vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀντοφθαλμ-έω,
look in the face, meet face to face, ἀ. κατὰ πρόσωπον [Refs 2nd c.BC+]: hence, defy, withstand, τινί and πρός τινα, [LXX]; ἀ τῷ ἀνέμῳ, of a ship, [NT+3rd c.AD+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to head into, face (the wind)
primarily to look in the face, metaphorically a nautical term, to bear up against the wind, Acts 27:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 直視(比喻船無從抵擋風浪) (徒 27:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 直视(比喻船无从抵挡风浪) (徒 27:15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi ngược lại; đi chống lại ; đương đầu
